attributes.action: make it mandatory that road works signage be removed on completion of works
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All agencies engaged in road works where temporary traffic signs are used to issue such to named forepersons who are to be personally financially liable for the safe return.  As it is this expensive litter is just tossed in the hedgerow - or in the carriageway to cause accidents - either way the tax payer ends up picking up the bill.
